text: 7.14: Ais 1.18; Dan 12.1; Mt 24.21; Mk 13.19; Hi 9.14; 1 Zo 1.7; VB 1.5; 6.9Gu ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Gu kaŋgi fhu, guman rum, ndu mbe kaŋgi.” Ana khaŋ na nzuai, “Mba gumgi, mbe fhum mba simtɨgi gum zaagi mbatɨgi guarira hi tugir, mbe thɨga havhargiap, mbara muuŋgia kegi gumgi ma. Mbe mba Sipsiva Ŋgugar vɨzɨna wari won shagi huri mpeeiŋ ruagim, nta guigira hurgi.
